overview: When beautiful and young Vanessa arrives to her date night, one of the first things she learns is that Tony is married. Although she's uncomfortable with the hookup, Tony assures her that everything is fine and that there's nothing to worry about. Sure, his wife doesn't know about his cheating ways, but she doesn't need to. He needs to fuck - and fuck a lot. When Joanna Angel and Aaron return from their date, Jane Wilde greets Aaron, telling him how excited she is that she's planning the wedding. Heâ€™s far from excited and is suspicious of her real motives. The next day, Jane flirts with him shamelessly. Aaron retorts that he and Jane were only together for ONE night, and it was a huge mistake...something that will NEVER happen again.
title: Dysfunctional Marriage
